name: Oro Rechoncho
additionalNotes: A 100% Nicaraguan “Puro” cigar, utilizing tobacco from Aganorsa in the Jalapa Valley in Northern Nicaragua. A medium to sometimes full body cigar made with premium aged full-leaf tobacco. Wrapped in Corojo 99 leaf for that smooth yet slightly spicy premium cigar. The distinctive flavor and aroma of Aganorsa stands out in this smooth, perfectly rolled cigar. The 60-ring size, perfect roll and short stature provides all the features needed to put out an impressive cloud of smoke as well.slightly spicy
